Description: Two joined fragments from the body of Clazomenian black-figure painted pottery hydria. Neck, painted dark. Shoulder, sirens. Belly, part of male head. Purple on necking ring, on forepart of wing of siren, on top and front hair of man. White on head, neck and chest of the sirens.
Curator's comments: For the shape compare Plate GB 592.3-4. BMC B.115.4 BSA xlvii, 131-C 1.6. Attributed to the Urla Group (Sabine Weber)
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 587, 13)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 139)
